workspaceContext.summary:
## Overview
Hi there! It looks like no specific files or directories have been provided in our workspace yet. To get started, could you please clarify what kind of context you’d like me to work on? For example:

## Flow
• If you’re working with a book- or documentation-style collection (e.g., Markdown files forming a reference manual), let me know if you’d like an overview of its structure, suggestions for improvements, or ideas for new sections/chapters.

## Signals
• If your workspace is code-heavy (for example, a repository of source code), please tell me which parts you’re focusing on—whether it’s a code review, refactoring help, ensuring documentation consistency within the code, etc.

## Edge Cases
Once I have more details about the specific artifact(s) or project areas you’d like to examine, I can adapt my approach accordingly. Let me know how I can assist further!
